actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Water and Power Resources

official_title: A bill to prohibit certain discharges of agriculture waste waters into Morro Bay or Monterey Bay, California.

summary.text: Prohibits the Secretary of the Interior from in any way funding the discharge of agricultural wastewaters from the Central Valley Project into the Pacific Ocean at either Morro or Monterey Bay, California.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit certain discharges of agriculture waste waters into Morro Bay or Monterey Bay, California.
